articles.title: Asia's Olympic champions and the quest for national glory - The Straits Times
articles.description: The Tokyo Olympics have seen athletes from Asia clinching more than 70 gold medals.. Read more at straitstimes.com.
articles.content: The Tokyo Olympics have seen athletes from Asia clinching more than 70 gold medals, bringing pride to a region grappling with worsening Covid-19 outbreaks. Asian Insider looks at some of the biggest … [+3851 chars]

articles.title: From VP in corporate world to making furniture: This man quit his stable job to pursue his woodworking hobby - AsiaOne
articles.description: In this series, AsiaOne speaks to individuals who find themselves changing careers and steering their lives in a new direction, whether by choice or circumstance. Some may consider switching career paths a terrible and rash idea, especially during a pandemic.…
